org.axiondb
Interface Constraint

All Known Subinterfaces:
SelectableBasedConstraint
All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseConstraint, BaseSelectableBasedConstraint
public interface Constraint

A database constraint, such as UNIQUE or NOT NULL.

Version:
$Revision: 1.13 $ $Date: 2003/02/12 16:19:54 $

Method Detail

resolve

public void resolve(Database db,
                    TableIdentifier table)
             throws AxionException
Resolve any unresolved identifiers I may have.

AxionException

evaluate

public boolean evaluate(RowEvent event)
                 throws AxionException
Evaluate the given event under me. Returns false if the constraint I represent has been violated.

AxionException

isDeferred

public boolean isDeferred()
Return whether or not I am deferred. Deferred constraints are not evaluated until the transaction is committed.

setDeferred

public void setDeferred(boolean deferred)
                 throws AxionException
Set whether or not I am deferred. Deferred constraints are not evaluated until the transaction is committed. Throws an exception if I am not deferrable and deferred is true.

AxionException

Return whether or not I am deferrable.
